post:
Happy [System Administrator Appreciation Day](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/System_Administrator_Appreciation_Day) to all LET members!

Fastmako celebrates this day with 2 coupons, applicable on all our VPS plans.

**LETTRY** = 10% off recurring discount, on **monthly** payment, with any plan equal or higher than 5EUR/mo
**LETGO** = 20% off recurring discount on **annual** payment, with any plan.

Here are some examples:

**ROOT 1N**
KVM in Netherlands
1GB RAM
1x CPU
20GB SSD space
1TB transfer
250Mbps uplink
1x IPv4
/128 IPv6
€2.5/month
€24/year with coupon LETGO
Offer link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

**ROOT 2N**
KVM in Netherlands
2GB RAM
1x CPU
40GB SSD space
2TB transfer
250Mbps uplink
1x IPv4
/128 IPv6
€4.5/month with coupon LETTRY
€48/year with coupon LETGO
Offer link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2

**UNMETERED 1N**
KVM in Netherlands
1GB RAM
1x CPU
20GB SSD space
Unmetered transfer
250Mbps uplink (up to 30TB, then 50Mbps)
1x IPv4
/128 IPv6
€4.5/month with coupon LETTRY
€48/year with coupon LETGO
Offer link: https://manager.fastmako.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=9
